Adventurer Helper:
Hear ye! Hear ye!
Akk adventurers planning to visit the *Shrine of* *Loyalty* must be aware of the following information. The place is not safe - though it was once widely visited by Aden`s warriors and mages, distant wars have drastically reduced the number of visitors. This hase led to the native monsters growing in both strenght and number, something that *Priest Bastian* wishes to see remedied.
All willing to help should speak to me for further details.
